name: Off-Road: Forest
description:
Realistic off-road SUV simulator in the forest.

Features:
- Realistic car physics
- Automatic and manual transmission controller
- Optimize forest map
- Multiplayer mode (new!) (beta)
- Realistic moorland
- Work system (beta)
- Fuel system (beta)
- Qualitative SUV models
- 2 types of cameras (usual and driver)
- 2 level of headlights (beam and main)
- Start-stop system
- Warning lights
